import sys

readline = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, readline().split())

    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    p, q, r = map(int, input().split())

    print(min(p + q, q + r, r + p))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

# 引数読み込み
argvs = sys.argv
p = int(argvs[1])
q = int(argvs[2])
r = int(argvs[3])

# 出力
print(min(p + q, p + r, q + r))
def main():
    p, q, r = map(int, input().split())

    print(min(p + q, q + r, r + p))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
